name: Ganesh Sahu
title: Full Stack Developer
bio: Passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies, system design, and agentic development. Experienced in building scalable applications from frontend to backend, with a strong focus on clean code and best practices.
tagline: Transforming ideas into reality through code

education.description: Pursuing degree with focus on software development and system design

experience.description: Led the implementation of a Hospital Management System that streamlined patient, doctor, and appointment management. Implemented secure authentication, RESTful APIs, and real-time notifications.

project.name: Hospital Management System
project.description: Built a comprehensive system with secure role-based access, real-time WebSocket notifications for doctors, and financial tracking modules. Optimized backend performance by resolving CLOSE_WAIT issues and implementing automation scripts.
project.problem: Inefficient hospital workflows and lack of real-time coordination between departments.

experience.description: Focused on creating innovative solutions using modern tech stacks.

project.name: Cloud Integration System
project.description: Implemented complex cloud integration patterns to ensure high availability and seamless data flow across distributed systems.
project.problem: Synchronizing real-time data across multiple cloud providers with minimal latency.
